subject: Attention please!!
body:
Attention please!!
This is Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield, the US Ambassador to the
United Nations. I write to inform you that your funds valued at
$10,316,000 USD only has been approved by the United Nations, and will
be released to you via ATM VISA Card by Agent Alison Rose, the CEO
National Westminster Bank (NatWest) Therefore, 
contact her with the
information listed below:
1.Full Names:...............................................
2.Home Address..............................................
3.Country:..................................................
4.State:....................................................
5.Occupation:...............................................
6.Cell/ WhatsApp Number:....................................
Note: You will also have to send her the sum of $250.00 USD for the
handling fee
 to enable her register your ATM card for onward delivery
to your address
Contact Email: 
rosealison121@gmail.com
Thanks
Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield

subject: Re: Attention please!!
body:
Hello Ambassador Linda,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that my funds are released to me. Could you please provide me with more details about the process? I would like to understand how everything works before proceeding.

Could you kindly let me know what the handling fee is for and how much it would be? Additionally, could you clarify if Agent Alison Rose is affiliated with the National Bank or if she is an independent agent?

I look forward to your response and appreciate your assistance.

Best wishes,
Marx
